Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 25 July 2025

S
howers will occur at times in the Western, Sabaragamuwa and Central provinces and in Galle
and Matara districts.

everal spells of showers may occur in the North-western province.
Strong  winds  of  about  (55-60)  kmph  can be  expected  at times  over  Western  slopes of  the
central hills and in Northern, North-central, and Central provinces and Puttalam, Trincomalee,
Monaragala  and  Hambantota  districts.  Fairly  strong  winds  about  (40-50)  kmph  can  be
expected at times elsewhere.
The general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by
strong winds.
